subject: Computers and the Internet
Television
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Productivity may tumble as fans watch video streaming of the 6th and 10th holes at the United States Open from Winged Foot from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Eastern on Thursday and Friday.
snippet: Productivity may tumble as fans watch video streaming of the 6th and 10th holes at the United States Open from Winged Foot from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Eastern on Thursday and Friday.
